game.title: Treasure Hunt
game.objective: Find the lost treasure hidden on Skull Island.
game.description: You have been hired by a wealthy merchant to find the lost treasure of Captain Blackheart. The treasure is said to be hidden on Skull Island, a remote and dangerous place. You will need to brave the perils of the island and find the treasure before someone else does.
game.reward: 1000 gold, a ship, and a crew.

task.objective: Find the map to Skull Island.
task.description: The map to Skull Island is said to be hidden in the old tavern in Port Royal. You will need to find the tavern and search for the map.
Once you have the map, you will need to travel to Skull Island. You can hire a ship or build your own. Be prepared for a treacherous journey.

Once you arrive on Skull Island, you will need to find the lost treasure. The treasure is said to be hidden in a cave at the center of the island. You will need to fight your way through pirates and wild animals to get to the treasure.
